name: Dystopia
nutshell: Welcome to this mad world.

name: The Wolf Marshal's Double Doting
tags: Official Colored,Animals,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Magic,Fantasy,Vampires,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Ryan is the son of the Prime Minister of the Blue Moon Empire and comes from a distinguished background. However, due to his unfavored status, he was often abused by his half-brother. He escaped from his brother's birthday party, but was captured by human traffickers and became an auction item for the underground trading place. By chance, Ryan was bought by Austin, the Supreme Commander of the Star Ocean Alliance. In a foreign country, he meets his mother's half-blood servant and gradually unravels the mystery of his birth. With the development of the story, a century of silence of the blood race also re-emerged, opening a new round of war between the orcs and the blood clan.

name: Kamiyadori no Nagi
nutshell: Sequel to Kamiyadori.

name: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club - Hazzzzzzzu!!! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Shizuku x Kasumi doujinshi set after the events of episode 8 of the 1st season.

name: Genshin Impact
nutshell: Aeons ago, the elder elemental gods granted civilization to the human race, but the world soon splintered as corruption and greed grew without check. Can the forces holding this world together be balanced against human desires, or is everything ultimately doomed to end in destruction?

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Kahasina - Assorted Works (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Part of the Kantai Collection franchise.
A collection of Kantai Collection related doujinshi by Kahasina, of the circle Moment Silicon. The stories are unconnected and not uploaded in any particular order.

name: The Makeup Remover
nutshell:
Studious and plain university student, Kim Yeseul, becomes the muse of genius makeup artist, Cheon Yuseong.
Official Indonesian Version

name: History's Strongest Disciple Kenichi +
nutshell:
Spin-off from History's Strongest Disciple Kenichi.
Note: Only read this manga once you're up to at least chapter 313 of Kenichi main series.
Released at the same time as Kenichi volume 48 (containing chapters 448-457), Kenichi Plus is a collection of three short stories that will take us back in time…
The first story features Tanimoto, as he kindly reminisces his memories of Kano Shou, from the first time he met him, up until Kano Shou last fight…
In the second story, we follow Loki and No.20 adventures, as they start and struggle to run their detective agency. But that's when Niijima shows up with a request that fit them perfectly.
For the final story, which features Renka, we will follow Pisuke's story, a bird who lived many adventures before ending up as Renka's pet.

name: Michi Michi
nutshell:
In a world of dreams that invites with a sweet and gentle touch, there lies a road flooded with joy traveled by two.
Inhabiting a teapot are the tsukumogami Chaki and Ryu—their job is to pour delicious tea. However, following the teapot’s dwindling use, it one day eventually breaks.
As for what awaits them on their departure to the outside world…

A baby mountain who doesn’t know what they’re supposed to be.
Chaki's water-person copycat.
Yamada-kun who wears a mysterious costume.

...And many other strange, eccentric characters, including the beginner-ghost Marimo coupled with her veteran-ghost grandmother, and the truly kind Ijiwaru coupled with a stuck-on-tail cat, all spread gracefully across a mysterious world.
(source: Kadokawa, translated)

name: Tesla Note
nutshell: Mission T is an intelligence operation with the task of saving the world from ruin! The main character is Negoro Botan, who was trained as a ninja from an early age and raised as the best intelligence agent. She teams up with another intelligence agent, Kuruma, and takes on the mission of the world’s fate. Their aim is to recover the heritage of the genius inventor Nikola Tesla, the “Tesla Shards”. Can the two accomplish their mission by overtaking other agents from other countries who are aiming for those same fragments?

name: BB.Hell
nutshell:
While she's patrolling the ruins of the housing complex where her father died years ago, high-schooler Himeji encounters a young man who claims to be from hell. The man, Yumeji, is apparently part of a new program, which has been started to solve the problem of hell having been filled up. Yumeji is allowed to return to Earth and work for his atonement, and he is given an ability related to his crimes (in his case, he can cut things with his hands). He can atone for his sins in three ways: by rescuing good people, by defeating bad people, or by killing others who have been released from hell. Yumeji is determined, though, that his atonement will be achieved without killing anyone. He'll have plenty of opportunity to work for his atonement alongside the justice-minded Himeji, who is already in a dangerous situation when they first meet!
(Source: MangaHelpers)

name: The Story of My Village
nutshell: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.

name: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.
nutshell:
The second part in the official long-running series about the daily mischief and wacky buffoonery of Gensokyo's Three Fairies of Light.
After Eastern and Little Nature Deity ended abruptly because Nemu Matsukura had to leave the project due to health reasons, artist Hirasaka Makoto took over as permanent artist for the series.
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.

name: [switch] - Homes (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Things in and from the past still affect the present.
A story set after the end of the main series. Hal and Kai, and Masataka and Keigo, figure out how to build a home together with their respective partners.

name: A.-D.O.G.S.
nutshell: In the beginning of the 21st century, the occurrence and severity of underage crimes were increasing exponentially. Ranging from assault, robbery, rape to murder, and spiraling out of control, the adults made drastic changes to the law regarding underage criminals, but no one could change their underlying dangerous nature. The A-Dogs were created to fight back and hunt down the dangerous teenagers who threatened to bring society into chaos. Lead by Captain Inukai, Tetsuro and Jackal are A-Dogsâ€™ elite warriors who have been trained to eliminate the danger to society.

name: Midori-kun wa Junjou
nutshell: Mirai always dreamed of going to an all-girls high school because she thinks that boys are violents and idiots. One day, cleaning the school with her friends, she meets Midori, an ex-delinquent boy from the neighboring all-boys high school and invites them to a goukon. he is completely unpredictable! The exciting days start now!?

name: Shirokuma to Fumeikyoku
nutshell: Kumamoto Chieko died just before she could fully enjoy school life as a high school student. Before it's fully decided whether she should be sent to Heaven or Hell, she gets tricked by a mysterious pumpkin-head "person" who instead sends her to Purgatory.

name: Adventures of God
nutshell: In this slice of (eternal) life, you'll meet God, visit Heaven and learn that what goes on behind the pearly gates isn't exactly the way the good book describes it. For starters, it's a pretty unhealthy work environment - what with God's ginormous, fragile ego and heavy drinking problem. The good news is that while heaven is a lot less holy than expected, it's much more hilarious too.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam - Char's Counterattack
nutshell: U.C. 0093 - Char Aznable, the infamous "Red Comet" of the One Year War, has come out of hiding to lead the Neo-Zeon Army and wage war against the Earth Federation. Only his greatest rival, Gundam pilot Amuro Ray, can stop him from dropping the Axis asteroid on Earth and causing a major global catastrophe.

name: Goldfisch
nutshell:
Say hi to Morrey Gibbs! A fisher-boy in a flooded world overrun with mutated animals known as "anomals", he's got more problems than just giant fish to deal with. Namely, how everything he touches turns to gold! Sure it sounds great, but gold underpants aren't exactly stylish… or comfortable.
Together with his otter buddy Otta and new inventor friend Shelly, Morrey's on a quest to rid himself of his blessing-turned-curse, and try to find a solution for the tragedy he unwittingly caused…

name: Koisuru Mitsuba
nutshell:
Even at school, the sober Mitsuba is attracted by the popular Sakurai-kun. But then, something big will happen…
Mitsuba is not very good at talking, and disappears in class sitting at the back corner of the classroom. She hasn't made a single friend, but when the hand of the most popular boy in school is stretched out to her… she begins to sparkle in her own way.

name: Perfect Surgeon
tags: Sci-Fi,Long Strip,Drama,Medical,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
When he was a child, his father was said to have died from a car accident. But what actually caused his death was ‘Medical Negligence’.
Ever since that, his dream was to become a ‘Perfect Doctor’ that would never deny or mistreat a patient.
However, reality was harsh.
His mother was inflicted with an incurable disease, which required a lot of money. He quit his university hospital internship and became a sell-out dermatologist.
While he had stopped in his tracks due to the harshness of reality, a state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence, ‘A.I. – Ronnie’, came to him.
And thus, his journey to become a perfect doctor started once again.


Webtoon PV

name: Ore to Joushi no Kakushigoto Tsuzuki no Hanashi
nutshell:
It’s been a month since Mikado, an idol otaku worked hard by the design company he’s employed at, has started dating his superior Anezaki.
Even though they’ve finally got consecutive days off, since it feels like they’re sex friends as they’ve just been holed up having sex, he wants to go on a date like normal lovers!
Anezaki seems dissatisfied, but then he and Mikado go on a hot springs trip togetherーー?

name: Light Wing
nutshell:
An amazing high-school soccer player, Amagai Rihito, is making his debut! He intended to enter a high school famed across Japan for its elite soccer team, but a little mix-up with the school name has left him at a school with an incredibly weak team. After the initial shock of discovering this, Rihito decides that he's willing to work to help his weak team become the best in Japan. The only problem is the rest of the existing team is cold and unenthusiastic. Will his challenge to take on the whole team single-handedly break them out of their apathy?
Includes the story Q Bu!! in vol.2. and Dodge Ball in vol.3.

name: Aldnoah.Zero Extra Episode
nutshell:
Released with the second volume in Blu-Ray of the series.
On 2012 Slaine Troyard's father passed away, so he was left with no one who would take care of him.

name: Trigger (Bulman-Issnyang)
nutshell: Nam Ji-il rolled into the high school that is famous as the Royal Kingdom of the delinquent. On the first day of school, he becomes a well-known bread shuttle boy in the entire school. While suffering from chronic heart disease, his weak body also has to suffer from assault any other kind of bullying, however, caused by an unexpected event his life reaches its turning point…

name: Echofreak
nutshell:
Read left to right.
In a world where hauntings are a common occurrence, ghost banishing has become your typical day-job. One of these banishers, Rad, is desperate to become the strongest in his field. That is, strong enough to take his sister back from a demon…

name: Shitsuke Kata wa Nijuumaru
nutshell: Shinobu Kasuga is good at his job, but needs something to relieve his stress. One night he finds Daisuke, who's like a big dog, and takes him home. Shinobu trains Daisuke to lick all over his body… But, the next day, he finds out they're working at the same place!

name: I’m All Alone with a Carnivorous Beast Son of a Noble on an Uninhabited Island!? Moan All You Want
nutshell: "Don't you want to thank your savior?" He's teasing me on my sensitive spots... I hate this guy, but I'm still feeling it! Following the clues of a big scoop, a weekly magazine reporter, Mio, went abroad for coverage by ship. When she came to her senses, she had landed on an uninhabited island... A shipwreck!? The person who saved Mio was Takato Masahiro, the missing son of a conglomerate. When she thought, "I'll get the scoop of my dreams," Takato pushed her down. "You and I are the only two people on this island. You understand the situation, right?" He licked her nipples with his hot tongue. It's useless, I can't hold my moans...!

name: Aioimusubi
nutshell: Kota attaches himself like a puppy to Makoto, who has been like a fatherly figure to him. Even after they have grown up, he still smiles and proclaims proudly that "Mako-san's food tastes just like a mother's does!" The two get along as well as a family, but one day, a customer arrives who is a thorn in Kota's side. The two appear friendly and Makoto shows expressions that Kota has never seen him make. And he acts differently than normal… Kota is plagued with dislike and worries that he can't shake off.

name: Discovering Our Hopeless Relationship
tags: Romance,Boys' Love,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
